title: Validator client running with the `--web` AND not already existing `validator.db` database NEITHER wallet directory crashes.
body:
### Describe the bug

Validator client running with the `--web` AND not already existing `validator.db` database NEITHER wallet directory crashes.

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

```text
Worked with `<v4.2.0`.
```


### ðŸ”¬ Minimal Reproduction

1. Remove the `validator.db` file
2. Remove the `prysm-wallet-v2` directory.
3. Run the validator client with the `--web` option.

### Error

```text
[2024-01-12 11:31:28] ERROR main: Runtime panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
goroutine 1 [running]:
runtime/debug.Stack()
	GOROOT/src/runtime/debug/stack.go:24 +0x64
main.main.func4()
	cmd/validator/main.go:197 +0x40
panic({0x1047f9b80?, 0x1056f2570?})
	GOROOT/src/runtime/panic.go:914 +0x218
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/validator/accounts/wallet.(*Wallet).AccountsDir(...)
	validator/accounts/wallet/wallet.go:318
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/validator/node.(*ValidatorClient).getLegacyDatabaseLocation(0x140004abe60, 0xd0?, 0x0, {0x1400071e000, 0x18}, {0x14000736a20, 0x25}, {0x1400049a140, 0x32})
	validator/node/node.go:227 +0xe0

	validator/node/node.go:140 +0x390
main.startNode(0x18?)
	cmd/validator/main.go:40 +0x2c
main.main.func1(0x1400044d1e0?)
	cmd/validator/main.go:125 +0x1c

	external/com_github_urfave_cli_v2/command.go:274 +0x730
github.com/urfave/cli/v2.(*App).RunContext(0x140003b05a0, {0x104a970d0?, 0x105b4ce80}, {0x1400004e230, 0x7, 0x7})
	external/com_github_urfave_cli_v2/app.go:332 +0x518
github.com/urfave/cli/v2.(*App).Run(...)
	external/com_github_urfave_cli_v2/app.go:309
main.main()
	cmd/validator/main.go:202 +0x1e8

panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference [recovered]
	panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x2 addr=0x10 pc=0x103e9c520]

goroutine 1 [running]:
main.main.func4()
	cmd/validator/main.go:198 +0xc0
panic({0x1047f9b80?, 0x1056f2570?})

github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/validator/accounts/wallet.(*Wallet).AccountsDir(...)
	validator/accounts/wallet/wallet.go:318
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/v4/validator/node.(*ValidatorClient).getLegacyDatabaseLocation(0x140004abe60, 0xd0?, 0x0, {0x1400071e000, 0x18}, {0x14000736a20, 0x25}, {0x1400049a140, 0x32})

```


### Platform(s)

Mac (Apple Silicon)

### What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)

v4.2.0
